[[File:Obcine Slovenija 2006.svg|250px|right|thumb|Slovenia divided into municipalities (as of 2006)]] {{Politics of Slovenia}} '''[[Slovenia]]''' is divided into 211 [[municipality|municipalities]] (''obÄine'', singular{{ndash}} ''[[obÄina]]''), of which 11 have urban status. [[Slovene language|Slovene]] is an [[official language]] of all the municipalities. [[Hungarian language|Hungarian]] is a second official language of 3 municipalities in [[Prekmurje]]: Dobrovnik (Dobronak), HodoÅ¡ (Hodos) and Lendava (Lendva). [[Italian language|Italian]] is a second official language of 3 municipalities in the [[Slovenian Littoral]]: Izola (Isola), Koper (Capodistria) and Piran (Pirano). ==List of Slovenian
